summary: This is just a prototype. I want to know what people think about it.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Prototype for a book series that I am writing where I give the Hero of Kvatch’s Autobiography. This is your character from Oblivion. There is a Hero of Kvatch Biography in the game, but not an Autobiography where he/she tells his/hers own story. The tale is meant to be humorous as well as blatantly sarcastic. 

You can find the two prototype novels in Breezehome… your Whiterun house. I have pictures attached for those having trouble finding them. There are only two books because I want to test the waters with this concept before I do like 50 volumes. 

Instillation: drop in the esp and check it off.
Requires: Skyrim ESM, Update ESM

Usage: Don’t use this for your own mod right now. This is just to see how people react before I do the ENTIRE thing.

Comments: Drop in a comment on what you think of the material. Keep in mind that I have several volumes planned for this project.
author: jcdenton2012
